Package system

Class Decimal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mases.jcobridge.netreflection.NetObject
      • system.ValueType
        • system.Decimal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJCOBridgeReflected, IDeserializationCallback, ISerializable
    public class Decimal
extends ValueType
implements ISerializable, IDeserializationCallback
    The base .NET class managing System.Decimal, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=6.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e.

    .NET documentation at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/System.Decimal

    Powered by JCOBridge: more info at https://www.jcobridge.com

    Author:
    MASES s.r.l https://masesgroup.com

      • cast

        public static Decimal cast​(IJCOBridgeReflected from)
                    throws java.lang.Throwable
        Try to cast the IJCOBridgeReflected instance into Decimal, a cast assert is made to check if types are compatible.
        Parameters:
        from - IJCOBridgeReflected instance to be casted
        Returns:
        Decimal instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - in case of error during cast operation
